Topic.Title: THE WORLD ENDS TODAY, I THINK (ILLUSTRATED UPDATE)

Posts.EditableText:
**EVERY. SINGLE. PANEL. IS. ILLUSTRATED**(with a few exceptions)**!!!!!!!!!**

That's right! After _half a year_, **it's finally complete.** I took a big giant break, but It's done. I wonder if maybe I can also add some music/SFX. Who knows, who knows...

**PLAY IT HERE!**
https://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/PNMno4m7GUu6ZYjROpbLEg/the-world-ends-today-i-think

I put a lot of heart and passion into this game, so I would really appreciate it if you gave it a play if you haven't already. Cheers!

Posts.EditableText:
Thank you @jmnevil54
Glad you could play!

However, there was a very minor bug that didn't render some of the images. It's all fixed now, thank goodness. But I'm glad that it didn't distract you from the original content!

Leave a positive review. It helps my game! :)

Posts.EditableText:
I think I mapped this f**ker out, trying every path (after dying a LOT). Total score was 1500. Man, if there is some sort of way I have to trigger further paths, I just don't know what they are. But I loved the animated art.

I go on a roll on the spaceship part and thought "Maybe... maybe..."

But no :)
